info.title: OpenAPI Plant Store
info.description: A sample API that uses a plant store as an example to demonstrate features in the OpenAPI specification

post.description: Compresses an image to an extreme degree, reducing file size significantly and returns the compressed image for download.

400.description: Bad Request. Possible issues: invalid image file or compression service failure.

detail.example: Image compression failed: Invalid image file.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during compression.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred: Memory allocation issue.

post.summary: Identifies the card, its side, and if it's blurry or grayscale
post.description: This API is designed to detect and classify identity cards, such as PAN and Aadhar cards, from input images. The service returns information about the detected card, whether the image is grayscale, and whether the image is blurry.

requestBody.description: Image file to be analyzed for card identification.

200.description: The card identification result, including card type, side, and image quality status.

is_grayscale.description: Indicates if the image is grayscale.

is_blur.description: Indicates if the image is blurry.

400.description: Bad Request. Possible issues: invalid image file or detection failure.

detail.example: Card detection failed: Invalid image file.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during card detection.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred: Memory allocation issue.

post.summary: Extract the signature of the person from a PAN card
post.description: This endpoint processes the image of a PAN card and extracts the person's signature, returning it as a PNG image. The image must clearly show the signature section of the PAN card to ensure accurate extraction.

requestBody.description: Image file of the PAN card from which the signature is to be extracted.

image.description: The image file of the PAN card to extract the signature from.

200.description: The extracted signature as a PNG image.

400.description: Bad Request. Possible issues: signature not detected or invalid PAN card image.

detail.example: Signature not found in the image.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during signature extraction.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred: Processing issue.

post.summary: Extract image of the person from any document
post.description: This endpoint extracts the photo of the person from any document image and returns the extracted image as a PNG file.

requestBody.description: Image file from which the person's photo is to be extracted.

image.description: The image file to extract the person's photo from.

200.description: The extracted photo as a PNG image.

400.description: Bad Request. Possible issues: photo not detected or invalid document image.

detail.example: Photo not detected on the document.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during photo extraction.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred: Processing issue.

post.summary: Verify if the extracted information from cards are as per government guidelines to mitigate tamper
post.description: This endpoint accepts an Aadhaar Number for Aadhaar internal verification or a PAN Number (with an optional Name) for PAN internal verification.

requestBody.description: A JSON object containing Aadhaar or PAN card details for internal verification.

Aadhaar_or_PAN_number.description: Aadhaar number or PAN number for internal verification.

200.description: Verification result, including whether it was successful, a message, and additional details like PAN type.

verified.description: Indicates if the verification was successful.

message.description: A message indicating the result of the verification.

pan_type.description: The type of PAN card verified (e.g., 'Personal', 'Business').

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid Aadhaar number, PAN number, or missing details.

detail.example: Invalid Aadhaar number or PAN number.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during verification.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred: Processing issue.

post.summary: Extracts basic details for demographic verification from Aadhaar inputs
post.description: This endpoint accepts Aadhaar Number, pincode, and date of birth (DOB) as input. It verifies the details and returns a response with the verification status, associated state, and age band.

requestBody.description: The Aadhaar number, date of birth, and pincode for demographic verification.

dob.description: The date of birth in dd/mm/yyyy format.

pincode.description: The pincode associated with the Aadhaar number.

200.description: A successful response with the verification result.

State.description: The state associated with the Aadhaar number.

Age Band.description: The age band determined based on the date of birth.

lower_limit.description: The lower age limit of the band.

upper_limit.description: The upper age limit of the band.

400.description: Bad Request. Possible issues: missing or invalid Aadhaar number, DOB, or pincode.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during Aadhaar verification.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred during the demographic verification process.

post.summary: Extract relevant data from the Aadhaar Card
post.description: This endpoint extracts detailed information from an Aadhaar card image, including Aadhaar Number, Name, Gender, Date of Birth, Address, and Pincode.

requestBody.description: Two images of the Aadhaar card for OCR processing. The first image is the front side, and the second image is the back side.

image1.description: The first image (front side of the Aadhaar card).

image2.description: The second image (back side of the Aadhaar card).

Aadhaar_number.description: The Aadhaar number extracted from the card.

Gender.description: The gender of the Aadhaar holder.

Name.description: The name of the Aadhaar holder.

Date of Birth.description: The date of birth of the Aadhaar holder.

Address.description: The address of the Aadhaar holder.
Address.example: C-304, Surya Kutir, 100 Feet Road, Opp. Sai Baba Mandir, Near Railway Station, Ahmedabad, Gujarat

Pincode.description: The pincode of the Aadhaar holder's address.

example.Name: Jimmit Patel
example.Address: C-304, Surya Kutir, 100 Feet Road, Opp. Sai Baba Mandir, Near Railway Station, Ahmedabad, Gujarat

400.description: Bad Request. Possible issues: missing or invalid images or OCR failure.

detail.example: Unable to extract or verify Aadhaar information.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during OCR processing.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred while extracting data from the images.

post.summary: Extract relevant data from the PAN Card
post.description: This endpoint extracts detailed information from a PAN card image, including PAN number, PAN type, Date of Birth, Name, and Father's Name.

requestBody.description: The image of the PAN card for OCR processing.

image.description: The image of the PAN card.

PAN_number.description: The PAN number extracted from the card.

Date_of_Birth.description: The date of birth of the PAN card holder.

Name.description: The name of the PAN card holder.

Fathers_Name.description: The father's name of the PAN card holder.

400.description: Bad Request. Unable to extract or verify PAN information.

detail.example: Invalid PAN card image or OCR processing failed.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during OCR processing.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred while extracting data from the image.

post.summary: Analyzes images based on various standard scores like BRISQUE, blurriness, brightness, and more.
post.description: This endpoint analyzes the quality of an image and provides various standard scores such as blurriness, BRISQUE, background uniformity, brightness, and contrast.

requestBody.description: The image file to be analyzed for quality.

is_grayscale.description: Indicates whether the image is in grayscale.

is_blur.description: Indicates whether the image is blurry.

blurriness_score.description: The calculated blurriness score of the image.

brisque_score.description: The BRISQUE score indicating overall image quality.

background_uniformity_score.description: The uniformity of the background in the image.

brightness_score.description: The brightness level of the image.

contrast_score.description: The contrast level of the image.

400.description: Bad Request. Invalid or unsupported image file.

detail.example: Invalid image file format or corrupted image.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during image analysis.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred while processing the image.

post.summary: Extracts basic demographic details from Aadhaar images
post.description: This endpoint extracts demographic details such as Aadhaar Number, Gender, Age Range, and State from the provided Aadhaar card images.

requestBody.description: Two images of the Aadhaar card for OCR processing. The first image is the front side, and the second image is the back side.

image1.description: The first image (front side of the Aadhaar card).

image2.description: The second image (back side of the Aadhaar card).

200.description: Successfully extracted demographic details from Aadhaar images.

Aadhaar Number.description: The Aadhaar number extracted from the card.

Gender.description: The gender of the Aadhaar holder.

Age Range.description: The age range derived from the Aadhaar holder's date of birth.

State.description: The state associated with the Aadhaar number.

400.description: Bad Request. Unable to extract or verify Aadhaar demographic information.

detail.example: Invalid Aadhaar images provided or OCR processing failed.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during OCR processing.

details.example: An unexpected error occurred while extracting data from the images.

post.summary: Complete end-to-end Aadhaar Verification from the images of Aadhaar Card

400.description: Verification failed

500.description: Internal Server Error

post.summary: Complete end-to-end PAN Verification from the image of PAN Card

400.description: Verification failed

500.description: Internal Server Error

post.summary: Compress large images of up to 500 MB to 40 KB

400.description: Image file exceeds the 500 MB limit

500.description: Image compression failed

post.summary: Compress medium-sized images of up to 250 MB to 40 KB

400.description: Image file exceeds the 250 MB limit

500.description: Image compression failed

post.summary: Compress small images of up to 75 MB to 40 KB

400.description: Image file exceeds the 75 MB limit

500.description: Image compression failed

post.summary: Compress small images of up to 20 MB to 40 KB

400.description: Image file exceeds the 20 MB limit

500.description: Image compression failed

post.summary: Verify phone number details
post.description: This endpoint accepts a phone number and an optional region code to verify its validity.

requestBody.description: The phone number to verify, along with an optional region code.

region.description: The optional region code for the phone number.
The region code associated with the phone number.

valid.description: Indicates if the phone number is valid.

possible.description: Indicates if the phone number is possible.

country.description: The country associated with the phone number.

location.description: The location associated with the phone number.

carrier.description: The carrier associated with the phone number, if available.

400.description: Invalid phone number. The phone number provided is either incorrectly formatted or invalid.

detail.description: Details about why the phone number is invalid.

500.description: Failed to verify phone number. An unexpected error occurred.

error.example: Unable to verify phone number due to an internal error.

post.summary: Verify face similarity between two images
post.description: This endpoint accepts two images and verifies if the faces in the images match. It provides a verification status, confidence level, and a descriptive message.

requestBody.description: Two images for face similarity verification.

image1.description: The first image for face verification.

image2.description: The second image for face verification.

verified.description: Indicates whether the faces in the images match.

confidence.description: The confidence level of the face match.

message.description: A descriptive message regarding the face verification result.

400.description: Invalid file type. Please upload valid image files.

detail.example: Invalid file type. Please upload valid image files.

500.description: Face verification failed. An unexpected error occurred.

error.example: Face verification failed due to an internal error.

post.summary: Creates a Face Liveness Session
post.description: This endpoint creates a Face Liveness session and returns a unique Session ID for the session.

requestBody.description: This endpoint does not require a request body.

SessionId.description: The unique Session ID for the Face Liveness session.

500.description: Error creating session. An unexpected error occurred.

error.example: Failed to create Face Liveness session.

post.summary: Fetches results for a Face Liveness session
post.description: This endpoint retrieves the liveness verification results for a given session using the provided `SessionId`.

requestBody.description: The SessionId of the liveness session for which results are to be fetched.

SessionId.description: The unique SessionId for the liveness session.
The SessionId for which results were retrieved.

Confidence.description: The confidence score for the liveness verification.

Status.description: The status of the liveness session.

400.description: Bad Request. The `SessionId` is missing or invalid.

detail.description: Error message indicating what is wrong with the request.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred while fetching liveness results.

error.example: Failed to fetch liveness results due to an internal error.

post.summary: Create a verification code for email
post.description: This endpoint generates and sends a verification code to the provided email address.

requestBody.description: The email address to which the verification code will be sent.

email.description: The email address for which the verification code is to be generated.

message.description: Confirmation message indicating the verification code was sent.

400.description: Bad Request. The email field is missing or invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Failed to send the verification code due to a server issue.

post.summary: Verify email verification code
post.description: This endpoint verifies the email verification code sent to the user. Both the email and the code must be provided.

requestBody.description: The email address and verification code to verify.

code.description: The verification code sent to the email address.

message.description: Confirmation message indicating successful email verification.

400.description: Bad Request. The verification code is invalid or expired.

detail.description: Details about why the verification failed.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred during email verification.

error.example: Error verifying the email code due to an internal error.

post.summary: Send OTP to a mobile number
post.description: This endpoint sends a One-Time Password (OTP) to the provided mobile number and returns a session ID for further verification.

requestBody.description: The mobile number to which the OTP will be sent.

mobile.description: The mobile number to send the OTP.

message.description: A message confirming the OTP was sent.

session_id.description: The session ID for the OTP verification process.

400.description: Bad Request. The mobile number is missing or invalid.

detail.description: Details about why the request is invalid.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An error occurred while sending the OTP.

error.example: Failed to send OTP due to a server issue.

post.summary: Verify OTP for a mobile number
post.description: This endpoint verifies the One-Time Password (OTP) for a given mobile number.

requestBody.description: The mobile number and OTP to verify.

mobile.description: The mobile number associated with the OTP.

message.description: Confirmation message indicating successful OTP verification.

400.description: Bad Request. OTP verification failed due to an invalid or expired OTP.

detail.description: Details about why the OTP verification failed.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An error occurred during OTP verification.

error.example: Failed to verify OTP due to a server issue.

get.summary: Returns the public IP address of the client

500.description: Unable to retrieve public IP address

get.summary: Returns the geolocation of the client based on their IP address

500.description: Unable to fetch geolocation

get.summary: Get dynamic geolocation info for the client's IP

500.description: Unable to fetch dynamic geolocation data

get.summary: Reverse geocode latitude and longitude into detailed location data

400.description: Invalid coordinates

500.description: Unable to reverse geocode the coordinates
